content.title: With Sincere Thanks, Regardless of Unsuccessful Funding
content.creator:
Jack Greenwood
March 4, 2019
content.content:
My family and I just wanted to say we sincerely thank those that liked our idea enough to make a donation.  We truly appreciate every cent that would have went to our invention, should we have been fully funded.
Unfortunately, we start again back at square one and would like to take a step back and hear from what you what we can do better/differently etc.
  *** We'd like to hear from you on how to improve our campaign. ***
A. Only offer echo-friendly sustainable straws
B. Better explain how a KickStarter Campaign works
C. Offer different reward options
- Give us some ideas
D. You tell us....

Thank you again!
The Greenwoods

comments.text: Too bad! I could use a straw like that. Sometimes I dilute my coffee with cold water - really bad for the taste - just so I can drink it sooner. Your straw would solve that problem for me. Can't believe there's only a dozen other people like me.

content.title: Help us get the word out.
content.creator:
Jack Greenwood
February 5, 2019
content.content:
Thank you all so much for believing in our little invention.  We truly believe it will revolutionize the way we drink coffee or any hot beverage.  Just think... no more stained teeth or another white shirt tossed in the trash!
We also intend to produce sustainable REUSABLE straws to keep our Earth healthy too.
Please share with your friends to help us get more backers, so we can make this COOL STRAW a reality.
